name: Spell Token
description: SPELL is the governance token for Abracadabra, a protocol that allows users to deposit interest-bearing assets such as Yearn vault tokens and mint Magic Internet Money (MIM), a synthetic stablecoin. SPELL can be staked to earn fees paid to the protocol from users borrowing against their assets.

en.description: SPELL is the governance token for Abracadabra, a protocol that allows users to deposit interest-bearing assets such as Yearn vault tokens and mint Magic Internet Money (MIM), a synthetic stablecoin. SPELL can be staked to earn fees paid to the protocol from users borrowing against their assets.

tr.description: SPELL, kullanıcıların Yearn vault jetonları ve sentetik bir sabit para olan Magic Internet Money (MIM) gibi faiz getiren varlıkları yatırmalarına izin veren bir protokol olan Abracadabra için yönetişim jetonudur. SPELL, varlıklarına karşı borç alan kullanıcılardan protokole ödenen ücretleri kazanmak için stake edilebilir.

vi.description: SPELL is the governance token for Abracadabra, a protocol that allows users to deposit interest-bearing assets such as Yearn vault tokens and mint Magic Internet Money (MIM), a synthetic stablecoin. SPELL can be staked to earn fees paid to the protocol from users borrowing against their assets.

zh.description: SPELL 是 Abracadabra 的治理代币，此协议允许用户存入生息代币如 Yearn 的机枪池代币来铸造合成稳定币 Magic Internet Money (MIM)。质押 SPELL 可以分享协议向借款用户收取的费用。

hi.description: SPELL शासन टोकन है Abracadabra के लिए, एक प्रोटोकॉल जो उपयोगकर्ताओं को ब्याज-असर वाली संपत्ति जैसे कि यर्न तिजोरी टोकन और Magic Internet Money (MIM), एक सिंथेटिक स्थिर मुद्रा, जमा करने की अनुमति देता है। SPELL को अपनी संपत्ति के बदले उधार लेने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से प्रोटोकॉल के लिए भुगतान की गई फीस अर्जित करने के लिए दांव पर लगाया जा सकता है।
